original_title: Сталинград. Мы еще живы или нет?
overview: We recall the bloodiest battle that has become a turning point in the European history of modern times - the Battle of Stalingrad: its causes, its main events. The film takes into account new research, uses little-known or previously unpublished materials of the Bundesarchiv and the Museum "Children of Tsaritsyn-Stalingrad-Volgograd".
title: Stalingrad. Aren't We Still Alive?
